cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper is about adapting machine translation models to individual users, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The most relevant sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics such as machine translation, language modeling, and text classification. The paper also involves neural networks, which could place it in sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the fact that the paper proposes a new technique for adaptation could make it relevant to sub-categories such as cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) or cs.CV (Computer Vision), which also deal with adapting models to specific tasks or domains.
